name: JMatch File
summary: Learn about .JMT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Hot Potatoes software consists of the JCross, JCloze, JQuiz, JMatch, JMix, and Masher utilities that can create different activities. Each utility creates an activity with a different file extension, such as the .JCW and .JCL extensions created by the JCross and JCloze programs.
NOTE: In 2009, the software was released as freeware.

description: Exercise file created by Hot Potatoes, a suite of programs used to make and share online quizzes; contains a word matching and ordering exercise.
